author: K.S. Sudhi
title: No home for women prisoners
description: A few, though granted parole to decongest jails, return very soon
content:
Jail is where the home is for a few women in the State. When hundreds of prisoners, including the convicted and the undertrials, happily walked out the prisons for short paroles, a few women returned to the jail as they did not have a place to go. 
A 40-year… [+1726 chars]
